header.description: No header/scalar tokens defined for this report.

rows.description: Gateway records from app_gateways table, one row per gateway with ID, name, host, adapter configuration, protocol hints, status, and timestamp metadata.

totals.description: No totals/aggregations defined for this report.

semantics: This report has no filter parameters. All gateways are displayed. Tokens are direct column passthroughs from app_gateways table.
transformations: No transformations required. Direct column mapping from app_gateways table.
